name: Pong - Clone
description:
This is a pong clone I made for a couple hours to refresh on the unity basics. Clicking the true or false on the AI toggle will allow you to play with a friend.

Player one is W to go up and D to go down.

Player two is Up Arrow to go up and Down Arrow to go down.

Everything was created by me with simple shapes, post-processing, code (including the exceptional AI...). I made the simple sounds using bosca ceoil and the font was free from DaFont.
